p: When we study the rank and weight of factors affecting the presence of common milkweed, it can be seen that the physical characteristic of soils is the primary factor determining the appearance of this species. Academic literature also indicates that loose, less cemented soils are favored by this species [ 12, 21, 28]. According to our results, there is 100% correlation between soil texture and the appearance of common milkweed ( Table 2).
